title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: The optometrist's office. A penguin sits above the OPTOMETRIST sign. Liane and Cartman are waiting in the lobby. Liane reads a magazine. A poster off to one side reads "Real eyes the beauty within."

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Mom, please can we just leave?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: You have to see the eye doctor, Eric.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: But I hate the eye doctor. He always makes fun of me for being fat.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: You're not fat, you're big-boned.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: That's what I told him, but he doesn't listen to reason.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Eric Cartman.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Weak.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Inside, Cartman stops

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hello, Eric.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hi, Dr. Lott

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: How's my little piggy today?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Ey! Don't call me a little piggy!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I just say that because you're my little buddy.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I'm just here for an eye exam, all right?! Keep the fat jokes to yourself!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hop up on the chair.  Don't break it now!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: God damn it!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Just kidding. Let's see how your eyes are doing.  All you have to do is read the letters. Can you see the letters?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Yes.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: All right, read them out for me.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I am a little piggy.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: Ey! [the optometrist laughs. Cartman stands up on the chair and
text: pushes the refractor away.] That does it! Mom!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: No no. That, that was just a weird coincidence. I do not know how that happened.  "I am a little piggy." Wow! What are the odds of that?  All right, let's get down to business, shall we?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh gee! That's a good idea! My mom isn't paying you to be a comedian!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hmm, let's see, which is better: one, or two? One, or two?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: They look exactly the same.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Just pick one. Or two.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I don't know, two!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Okay. One, or two? One, or two?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Uh, one.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: One, or two? One, or two?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Two.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: No! The answer is one, piggy! One!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Ow! I hate you!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Yes, there is obviously a problem with your eyes. I am gonna have to dilate them and run some tests.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Lunchtime at the school cafeteria. Stan, Kyle and Kenny stand in line to get their lunches

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I wonder how come Cartman's not in school today?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Yeah. Usually when he ditches school, he still shows up for lunch.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: {Maybe he took a dump and got sick.}

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Yeah.  Oh, here he comes.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hey dudes.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Whoa, what happened to your eyes, Cartman?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: My asshole eye doctor made them all dilevated.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Why?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Why? I'll tell you why! Because he's a God-damned asshole, aaand, that's about it!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Why do you have to see an eye doctor?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Because my eyes suck. But that doctor likes to torture me and I have to go back tomorrow, and I don't know what I'm gonna do.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Dude, just ask Chef for help. He always knows what to do.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hey, yeah!  Ow!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: The kitchen. The boys approach the lunch counter

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hey Chef!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hello there, children.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Dude, my eyes are seriously screwed up. Chef looks like a skinny little white guy.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: It's time for lunch-e-roo

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Where's Chef?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Chef quit.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: What?!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Chef is gone. So let my introduce myself. I'm your new cook, Mr. Durp.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Mr. Durp?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: When I'm in the kitchen, you never know what nutty things are gonna happen. If you like Chef, you're gonna love Mr. Durp.  Ooo! Durp!  Durp! O-hoh wasn't that silly kids?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Why did Chef quit?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Aren't I a great character? My antics go right to the funny bone.  Oh, I don't feel so good.  Durp!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Could you just hand us some food please?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Sure gang! I have yellow stuff or white stuff, huh. Durp!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Can I have the yellow with a side of white?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: the boys reenter the cafeteria with their lunches

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Dude! I hate Mr. Durp!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Yeah, we gotta talk to Chef after school and get him to come back.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I don't know, you guys. That hammer thing was pretty funny.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Shut up, Cartman!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Chef's house. The boys reach the front door

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Ow!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh! Hello there, children!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Chef, what the hell are you doing? We almost starved to death at lunch today.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh! Didn't they tell you? I quit.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Yeah, but we didn't believe them.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Well, it's true.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: But why? Why would you quit?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Children, three nights ago I was at the library checking out some books on kama sutra when I met the most amazing woman ever. She knew so much about so many things. She really got me thinking. We eventually came back to my place and really hit it off.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: So you made sweet love to her down by the fire.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: No no, we just sat there all night long and... taaalked

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Talked?!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Yeah. She told me all about the powers of goddess, and how men have been oppressing women for years and viewing them as sexual objects, and I realized that I had done that myself.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh! What darling little children.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Here she is now. Children, meet my new girlfriend, Veronica.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: That's nice. Look Chef, Cartman's got this eye doctor, see, and he- Girlfriend?!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Children, Veronica is moving in with me.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Moving in?!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I'm in love.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Love?!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh, you knight.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: What the hell is going on?!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Veronica spent the whole day sharing her favorite poems with me.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Sorry boys, looks like I'm stealing Chef away from you.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: But Chef always helps us with our problems. When we have a problem, Chef sings to us and makes it better.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Well, I can still do that, children. In fact, Veronica can help me. She's a great singer, too.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: What's the problem?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: My eyes are going bad, but the only eye doctor in South Park is really, really mean.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh, I know just the song for you.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: There's got to be a morning after

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: if we can hold on to the night

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: the boys are shocked, and Kenny pulls his hood tight

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: We have a chance to find the sunshine.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Let's keep on looking for the light.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: This... is insane.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: On the sidewalk. The boys walk away from Chef's house

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: That bitch!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: She's stealing Chef from us.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: He didn't even seem like Chef. He seemed like a empty shell of a man.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Maybe it's just a phase. We just have to get him alone so we can tell him what a bitch she is.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Wait you guys.  Maybe, is it possible that we're just jealous because Chef is our friend, and now he's paying attention to somebody new?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Yeah, so?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: ...Yeah, screw that bitch.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Bitch, I hate that bitch!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Look, we've just gotta get Chef alone. He won't listen to reason with that hooker around.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Let's find out where he's working and go see him there tomorrow.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Good idea.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: The optometrist's office. Dr. Lott sits in the examination room holding a clipboard

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: All right, we got the test results back, piggy-

title: THE SUCCUBUS

title: THE SUCCUBUS

title: THE SUCCUBUS

title: THE SUCCUBUS

text: Hey, Chef-o, we're gonna run down to the office supply store and get some leather holders for our pagers, you wanna come?

title: THE SUCCUBUS

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Children, Veronica showed me that I've been living a very empty life. Meaningless sex is fun for twenty or thirty years, but after that, it starts to get old.

title: THE SUCCUBUS

text: The bus stop. The boys wait for Chef. Cartman carries a bat in his right hand and a baseball in his left

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: The day passes into night, and Kenny falls asleep. Rats gather and nibble on him. The others stand watch waiting for Chef, but there's no sign of him. The night turns to day, and still no Chef. Kenny wakes up...

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Dude! He bailed on us!

title: THE SUCCUBUS

title: THE SUCCUBUS

title: THE SUCCUBUS

title: THE SUCCUBUS

title: THE SUCCUBUS

role: There's got to be a morning after.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: South Park Elementary, Mr. Garrison's class

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: And that, children, is what you need to know about The Facts Of Life. So, let's review.  Tootie left in the fourth season, but Blair and Jo stayed on and got husbands, leaving the fifth and sixth seasons hideously stagnant.  Okay children, that's lunch. See you in thirty minutes.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Mr. Garrison, can we talk to you?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Sure.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Normally we go to Chef with our problems, but wuh we can't this time.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Well children, I am your teacher. I think you'll find that my advice is just as valuable as Chef's, if not more so.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: All right. Mr. Garrison, have you ever had a friend who got a new girlfriend, and then stopped being your friend, and it pissed you off?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh, the old succubus syndrome.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: What's a succubus?

title: THE SUCCUBUS

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: That's it!

title: THE SUCCUBUS

text: This is totally what's happening!

title: THE SUCCUBUS

text: Yeah, I tell you boys, women can kill. Poontang's expensive. That's why when it comes to chicks, I just screw them and leave them. I'd say "get out of my bedroom, poontang, before you suck my life dry!"

text: Thanks, Mr. Garrison.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: The living room. The boys reach the sofa and hop up to sit on it. Chef's parents sit across from them on the love seat. An uneasy silence follows

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Well, aren't you crackers just cute as the dickens?

title: THE SUCCUBUS

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Say, would you crackers like to hear about the time we saw the Loch Ness monster?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Ooh, it must've been about seven, eight years ago. Me and the little lady was out on this boat, you see, all alone at night, when all of a sudden this huge creature, this giant crustacean from the paleolithic era, comes out of the water.

text: We was so scared, Lord have mercy, I jumped up in the boat and I said "Thomas, what on earth is that creature?!"

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: It stood above us looking down with these big red eyes,-

text: What? What happened?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: King Jimmy's Buffet. A banner spans the front of the restaurant, saying, "Clsoed for Wedding Rehearsal Dinner Party." Chef, his family, Veronica, and other guests are present. Soft jazz plays in the background.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Could I have your attention please? Tomorrow, my son is gonna get married to a beautiful lady.  I'm very happy for them both.  Ooh there I go! I told myself I wasn't gonna cry, now.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: It's okay, pop.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Thomas, you're gonna get me going now.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh, I remember when Chef was just a three-year-old little man. He came running up to me with a big smile and his little chef's hat on, and he said, "Poppa, poppa!" I said "What do you need, Chef, my boy?", and he said, "...I need about tree-fitty."

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: ...Tree-fitty.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Well, it was about that time I got suspicious. I said, "Chef, why do you need tree-fitty?" He said, "My imaginary friend Goo-Goo the dinosaur wants it." I went to my son's room, and sure enough, there was the Loch Ness monster!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh, it was scary!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I said, "Dammit monster! You stop bugging my children now! We work for our money in this house and we don't give money away!"

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: the door opens, and the boys enter

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Excuse me!  We're sorry to interrupt, but we've got bad news.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: This is not a woman! It is a succubus!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: What?!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Yeah! She's evil and wants to suck Chef's life out of him

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Children! That hurts my feelings.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh, you can pretend all you want! You're not fooling anybody!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: All right guys! That's enough! I have had it with you! This is the happiest time of my life, and you can't be happy for me!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Chef, but-

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: No buts, Stan!  I love this woman, and I am marrying her! Now you can either accept that, or get out of my life! Now if you'll excuse us, we're having a party.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: So I chased the monster down the street, you see...

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Outside, the boys walk away from the restaurant

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I guess there's nothing we can do. Chef likes her more than us.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: No! I'm not willing to give up! Chef wouldn't give up on us!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Cartman's room, morning. Cartman is in bed with patches over his eyes. Stan, Kyle, and Kenny are reading books on demonology

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh man! There's tons of stuff on succubuses, but nothing on how to stop them.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: You guys, it's six in the morning, I have to get some sleep.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Dude! Chef's wedding is in three hours. We've got that much time to find out how to destroy a Succubus.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: You know what?! Screw Chef! There, I said it! Screw him! Let him marry a succubus! I wanna go to sleep.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Here! Here! Look at this. It says "The succubus enchants its victim with an eerie melody. This is the Succubi power. Only playing this melody backwards can vanquish the succubus power."

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: What the hell does that mean?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I don't know.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: (Hey, you guys! You guys, I think I know precisely what it's saying. It says that we've gotta go and find a pile of records and get the one that has the entire lyrics, and then we gotta get into learning to rearrange them.)

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Right.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: (And then we gotta go down and get a piece of paper and write down each one of the words we sang on the tape deck. And then, sing it back again!)

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Yeah?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: (That's what that means!)

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh-hoho!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hey yeah! What's that song she always sings? There's got to be a morning after.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: If we can hold on to the night.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: We've got to find our way together...

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: That's it! We gotta learn that song backwards.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: In three hours.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: First Church of South Park. A banner above the lower cross reads "Congratulations Chef and Veronica." People are streaming in for the wedding

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Ah man! I can't keep my eyes open.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: We can't fall asleep. We gotta nail that song.  You got the tape recorder, Cartman? Cartman??

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: He's asleep. Wake up fatass!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: What what what?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: God-damnit! You can't fall asleep.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I wasn't sleeping, I was just thinking really hard!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: ...And then these aliens had me up on their ship, right? They was probing me and all that.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: We had taco salad that night.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Don't matter what we had for dinner woman! Now this alien had a big head and big black eyes, and it was all bent over me. I said, "What do you want from me, alien?!" and do you know what he said?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Tree-fitty.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Uh. Let me tell the damn story now! He said, "tree-fitty." And so I realized I that it wasn't no alien, it was that God-damned Loch Ness monster again, trying to trick me into giving him tree-fitty by dressing up like an alien. Don't that just beat all?!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I had just given him tree-fitty the week before.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: What?! You gave that monster another damn tree-fitty?!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: He tricked me.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Well no wonder the damn monster keeps coming back to our house! You keep giving it tree-fitty!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: The ceremony begins. An usher goes up to a turntable and sets the needle down on a racord. Veronica enters in a traditional wedding gown

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: There she is!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Bitch. Bitch.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Bitch.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Bitch.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Dirty bitch.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: All right. Kyle and I are gonna take our positions up front.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Okay.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Do you, Chef, take this woman as your lawful-wedded wife, to have and to-

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Iii do!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Aaah, my baby's getting married!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: And do you, Veronica, take Chef to be your daddy?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I do!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: And now a special sharing of vows through song.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Here it goes

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: There's got to be a morning after.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Now, Cartman!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Now, Cartman!!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Children! You are screwing up my wedding!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I'll take care of them!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Cartman!! Wake up you fat piece of crap!!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Ow!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: light the for looking on keep Let's

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Aaargh!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: the find to chance a have We

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Noooo!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: What the-?!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: -the to on-

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh no! The tape jammed!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh my God!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh my God!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: What the-?!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: She's a goddam Succubus!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Succubus trying to take my baby!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Outside, The doors open and people pour out

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Inside, Stan and Kyle try to get Cartman's attention again

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Come on Cartman!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I can't see anything!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: (Wait...)

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh my God! She killed Kenny!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: You bastard!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: You damn monster! Get away from my baby!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hold on, now, I'll see if I have tree-fitty!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh my-

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Got it!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: Warm and safe that's... [the ground opens up, flames appear, and
text: the succubus drops down into the hole. The flames leave with her. Chef walks up to the hold and looks over it]

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hoh, wow! You don't see that every day!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: We're sorry Chef, we had to do it!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: No I'm, I'm glad you did, children. Now that she's gone, I can't really figure out what I ever saw in her.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Poontang's poontang.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Come on, children. Let's go get some ice cream.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hooray!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: What? What happened you guys? Is Kenny okay?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: The cafeteria kitchen. Chef is back at the counter as the boys enter.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hello there, children!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Hey, Chef!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: How would you like some fish sticks and tater tots?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: We'd love them!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: It's great to have you back Chef!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Yeah, well, I learned a very important lesson this week:

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: begins to sing

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: Sometimes you fall in love and you think it feels that way forever.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: You change your life and didn't know your friends cause you think
text: it can't get any better.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: But then love goes away; no matter what, it doesn't stay as strong.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: And then you're left with nothing, cause your tinking with your
text: dong.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: So watch out for that love bug! It can destroy like a typhoon
text: wind!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
role: Just play it cool and don't be a fool...

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: And never let poontang come between you and your friend.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Daaamn right, Garrison!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: The optometrist's office. Cartman walks in with a large ice box. His bandages are off. Now we know why he wasn't at school with Stan and Kyle.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Oh, hello, piggy. How are your eyes doing?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: After today they're gonna be fine, and I'll never have to see you ever again!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: I don't think that's possible, piggy, not with your eyes.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: No, not with my eyes. With these!  Ha ha ha ha ha ha!

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Was he an organ donor?

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: Eh-sure.

title: THE SUCCUBUS
text: All right, then let's get to work. Say, you don't have three dollars and fifty cents on you, do you?
